message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item, and I believe it's a fair price considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm willing to make a serious offer for this product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider my own needs as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $850000. This is a fair compromise that still benefits both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $800000? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product at this price.
